00019 #include "ItemIDTree.h"
00020 #include "SmallestRoutingCostTable.h"
00021 #include "MapBits.h"
00022 
00023 #include <set>
00024 
00025 
00026 class MMRoutingCostTable : public SmallestRoutingCostTable {
00027 public:
00028 
00037    inline const RoutingCosts* getCostsUsingTree(const ItemIDTree& tree,
00038                                                 uint32 fromMapID,
00039                                                 uint32 toMapID);
00040 
00041 private:
00042 
00047    const RoutingCosts* getMinCost(const set<uint32>& fromMapIDs,
00048                                   const set<uint32>& toMapIDs,
00049                                   uint32 realFromMap,
00050                                   uint32 realToMap);
00051

00053 
00054 
00055 inline const RoutingCosts*
00056 MMRoutingCostTable::getCostsUsingTree(const ItemIDTree& tree,
00057                                       uint32 fromMapID,
00058                                       uint32 toMapID )
00059 {
00060    const RoutingCosts* costs = getCosts(fromMapID, toMapID);
00061    if ( costs != NULL ) {
00062       return costs;
00063    }
00064 
00065    // Blagh. Find the costs using the tree.
00066    set<uint32> fromMaps;
00067    if ( MapBits::isOverviewMap( fromMapID ) ) {
00068       ItemIDTree newTree;
00069       tree.getContents( fromMapID, newTree );
00070       newTree.getLowestLevelMapIDs( fromMaps );
00071    } else {
00072       fromMaps.insert(fromMapID);
00073    }
00074    
00075    set<uint32> toMaps;
00076    if ( MapBits::isOverviewMap( toMapID ) ) {
00077       ItemIDTree newTree;
00078       tree.getContents( toMapID, newTree );
00079       newTree.getLowestLevelMapIDs( toMaps );
00080    } else {
00081       toMaps.insert(toMapID);
00082    }
00083 
00084    return getMinCost(fromMaps, toMaps, fromMapID, toMapID);
00085    
00086 }
